title: BT exclusive: First look of Deepika Padukone aka Mastani from the song 'Deewani Mastani'
text:
First look of Deepika Padukone aka Mastani's look from the song 'Deewani Mastani' from Sanjay Leela Bhansali's Bajirao Mastani that releases December 18.
READ: Sanjay Leela Bhansali celebrates a year of shooting 'Bajirao Mastani'
